title: Iran state media confirms killing of Ayatollah Ali Khamenei after US-Israeli missile strikes
summary_full: Confirmation of supreme leader’s killing follows announcement by Donald Trump that ‘one of the most evil people in history, is dead’US-Israel war on Iran – latest updatesAt a glance: what we know so far on day two War on Iran: how the US-Israeli bid for regime change unfoldedIran’s supreme leader, Ali Khamenei, was killed, Iranian state media has confirmed, in the opening salvo of a war the US and Israel launched with the aim of regime change.Khamenei had not been heard from since the strikes began, and satellite imagery showed that his secure compound was heavily damaged in the initial barrage on Saturday. Continue reading...
